mapper.select: SELECT w.id AS id, w.product_id AS productId, p.name AS productName, p.price AS price, p.image_url AS imageUrl FROM wishlists w JOIN products p ON w.product_id = p.id WHERE w.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY w.created_at DESC
SELECT id, user_id, product_id, created_at FROM wishlists WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, user_id, product_id, created_at FROM wishlists WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND product_id = #{productId} LIMIT 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wishlists WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND product_id = #{productId}
